settings.question: What does the Lifetime Manufacturing Warranty cover?
settings.answer: Defects in materials and workmanship such as loose stones and faulty clasps during normal use.

settings.question: Is the warranty transferable?
settings.answer: No, not transferable and only valid for the original purchaser of the jewelry.

settings.question: How do I claim my warranty?
settings.answer: Email our Customer Service Team at care@stienhardt.com with your original receipt and details of the issue.

settings.question: What items are excluded from the warranty?
settings.answer: Excludes normal wear and tear, theft or loss and alterations after purchase.

settings.question: How long does it take to process a warranty claim?
settings.answer: The timeframe may vary depending on assessment; we will resolve as soon as possible.

settings.question: Can I get my jewelry repaired if it's not covered by the warranty?
settings.answer: Yes, if not under warranty we can provide a quote for the work.

settings.all-sold-out-text: Please choose and update the products as per availability!
